earlyblightalternariasolani.details: Early blight caused by a fungus, Alternaria solani, which over-winters in the soil and infected plants
earlyblightalternariasolani.recomendations: Organic - Copper spray, biofungicide like Serenade.
earlyblightalternariasolani.title: Disease - Early blight

southern blight.details: Southern blight is caused by the soil borne fungus Sclerotium rolfsii

fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.details: Fusarium wilt is a disease caused by a fungus, Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. Lycopersici, which lives in the soil.
fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.recomendations: There is no chemical treatment available.Destroy infected plants immediately. keep soil pH between 6.5 and 7.0 and use a nitrate-based nitrogen fertilizer
fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.chemical: There is no chemical treatment available.Destroy infected plants immediately. keep soil pH between 6.5 and 7.0 and use a nitrate-based nitrogen fertilizer
fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.title: fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato

mosaic virus tomato.details: There is no cure for tomato mosaic virus. Once a plant is infected, it stays that way, and the virus can easily be transmitted to other plants.
mosaic virus tomato.recomendations: There is no cure for tomato mosaic virus. Once a plant is infected, it stays that way, and the virus can easily be transmitted to other plants.
mosaic virus tomato.chemical: No chemical products are available to cure or protect plants
mosaic virus tomato.title: mosaic virus tomato
